-- | clientsession support for apiary web framework.
--   
@package apiary-clientsession
@version 1.4.0

module Web.Apiary.Session.ClientSession
data ClientSessionConfig
ClientSessionConfig :: ByteString -> Maybe ByteString -> Maybe ByteString -> Bool -> Bool -> Maybe DiffTime -> IO Key -> ClientSessionConfig
csCookieName :: ClientSessionConfig -> ByteString
csCookiePath :: ClientSessionConfig -> Maybe ByteString
csCookieDomain :: ClientSessionConfig -> Maybe ByteString
csCookieHttpOnly :: ClientSessionConfig -> Bool
csCookieSecure :: ClientSessionConfig -> Bool
csTTL :: ClientSessionConfig -> Maybe DiffTime
csSessionKey :: ClientSessionConfig -> IO Key
initClientSession :: (MonadIO m, Serialize sess) => proxy sess -> ClientSessionConfig -> Initializer' m (Session sess m)
instance (Serialize sess, MonadIO m) => SessionBackend (ClientSessionBackend sess m) sess m
instance Default ClientSessionConfig
